items.title: Document version
items.help_text: Identify and describe the current version of the document

items.title: Unique parent identifier
items.help_text: Global unique persistent identifier of the parent record, eg. a data collection that includes several datasets

items.title: Hierarchy level
items.help_text: List of Scope(s), or 'hierarchy level(s)'. e.g. dataset, service. Recommended code following the ISO/TS 19139 Scope codelist

items.title: Hierarchy level name
items.help_text: List of scope / hierarchy level names. Alternative to the use of 'hierarchyLevel' code items

items.title: Date stamp
items.help_text: Date and time when the metadata record was created or updated. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

items.title: Metadata standard name
items.help_text: Standard name of the metadata standard used. Recommended value: ISO 19115:2003/19139

items.title: Metadata standard version
items.help_text: Version of the metadata standard used. Optional for ISO/TC211 standard if the metadata standard name includes the inception year

items.title: Dataset URI that uniquely identify the dataset
Reference system info
items.help_text: Description of the spatial and/or temporal reference systems used in the dataset.

props.title: Type
props.help_text: Date type e.g. publication, revision, creation
